Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
CAN: Draw a basic shape resembling a plant.
(inconsistently) Include elements like roots, stem, and leaves, but not proportionate or labeled clearly.
CANNOT: Accurately depict differences between a healthy, growing plant and one lacking water (plant looks similar with or without water, *(student doesn’t realize water’s role)*)
Show the effect of no light on plant growth (plant's appearance remains unchanged or confuses the role of light and water, *(student doesn’t understand light’s impact on growth)*)
Identify patterns about plants needing water and light to live and grow (no pattern recognition or explanation given, *(student may not understand these needs)*)
